caption:
🗣️ Paul Pogba: “I have an incredible desire to come back, I feel like a child who wants to be professional. I train, I do everything I can to get back on the field.”

I’m still a football player. Don’t look at that stuff saying I’m retiring, I’m finished. I want to fight for my career.”

Paul Pogba’s has served his 18month ban & he can now play professional football once again.

🇫🇷Paul Pogba All-Time Career:
🏟️ Games: 537
🚀 Goals: 87
🎯 Assists: 105

🏆 Trophies: 13
🏆 World Cup
🏆 UEFA Nations League 

Which club should he join?👇
